item.title: Auxiliary Pump – (AC Motor Pump) Systems #4 Pump

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Demand Pump Selector is properly positioned.

numlitem.para: Before engine start, position the associated Demand Pump Selector to OFF.
After engines are started, use normal procedures to position the Demand Pump Selector.

placard.para: Placard the Demand Pump Selector AUX Position: "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Position associated Demand Pump Selector(s) to OFF or AUTO.
When towing aircraft, have APU running to provide electrical power and bleed air. Pressurize hydraulic system 4, 1, or 2 with applicable system demand pump.

note.para: UPS B-747-400Fs have an AC motor-driven demand pump on System No. 2.
